scripts.postinstall: (cd static && npm install); (cd static/spaceSettings && npm install); (cd static/contentBylineItem && npm install); (cd static/modal && npm install);
scripts.remove-all-node-modules: (rm -rf ./node_modules); (cd static && rm -rf ./node_modules); (cd static/spaceSettings && rm -rf ./node_modules); (cd static/contentBylineItem && rm -rf ./node_modules);  (cd static/modal && rm -rf ./node_modules);
